summary.span: 表示非同步作業。

span.span: Represents an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別的代表單一作業不會傳回值，而此通常是以非同步方式執行。The class represents a single operation that does not return a value and that usually executes asynchronously. 物件是其中一個的中央元件[工作架構非同步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md)首度引進.NET Framework 4 中。 objects are one of the central components of the [task-based asynchronous pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md) first introduced in the .NET Framework 4. 因為工作所執行物件通常是以非同步方式執行的執行緒集區執行緒上而不是以同步方式主應用程式執行緒，您可以使用屬性，並將， ，和屬性，以判斷工作的狀態。Because the work performed by a object typically executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread rather than synchronously on the main application thread, you can use the property, as well as the , , and properties, to determine the state of a task. 大多數情況下，lambda 運算式用來指定的工作是將執行的工作。Most commonly, a lambda expression is used to specify the work that the task is to perform. 傳回值的作業，您使用類別。For operations that return values, you use the class. 本節內容：In this section: [工作具現化範例](#Instant) [Task instantiation examples](#Instant) [建立和執行工作](#Creating) [Creating and executing a task](#Creating) [將工作建立及執行](#Separating) [Separating task creation and execution](#Separating) [等候一或多個工作完成](#WaitingForOne) [Waiting for one or more tasks to complete](#WaitingForOne) [工作和文化特性](#Culture) [Tasks and culture](#Culture) [適用於偵錯工具開發人員For debugger developers](#Debugger) ## 工作具現化Task instantiation 下列範例會建立並執行四項工作。The following example creates and executes four tasks. 三個工作執行委派名為`action`，它會接受類型的引數。Three tasks execute an delegate named `action`, which accepts an argument of type . 第四個工作執行的 lambda 運算式 (委派) 也就是內嵌定義的工作建立方法的呼叫中。A fourth task executes a lambda expression (an delegate) that is defined inline in the call to the task creation method. 每項工作是具現化，並以不同方式執行：Each task is instantiated and run in a different way: - 工作`t1`會藉由呼叫的工作類別建構函式的具現化，但藉由呼叫並啟動其方法只有在工作之後`t2`已啟動。Task `t1` is instantiated by calling a Task class constructor, but is started by calling its method only after task `t2` has started. - 工作`t2`會具現化並啟動單一方法呼叫中，藉由呼叫方法。Task `t2` is instantiated and started in a single method call by calling the method. - 工作`t3`會具現化並啟動單一方法呼叫中，藉由呼叫方法。Task `t3` is instantiated and started in a single method call by calling the method. - 工作`t4`藉由呼叫主執行緒上同步執行方法。Task `t4` is executed synchronously on the main thread by calling the method. 因為工作`t4`執行以同步方式，它會在主應用程式的執行緒上執行。Because task `t4` executes synchronously, it executes on the main application thread. 其餘的工作以非同步方式執行通常在一或多個執行緒集區執行緒上。The remaining tasks execute asynchronously typically on one or more thread pool threads. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/cs/startnew.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/vb/startnew.vb#01)] ## 建立和執行工作Creating and executing a task 可能在各種不同的方式建立執行個體。 instances may be created in a variety of ways. 最常見的方法，從開始提供[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，是呼叫靜態方法。The most common approach, which is available starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], is to call the static method. 方法提供簡單的方式來啟動工作，使用預設值且不需要額外的參數。The method provides a simple way to start a task using default values and without requiring additional parameters. 下列範例會使用方法啟動的工作，執行迴圈，並接著會顯示迴圈反覆項目數目：The following example uses the method to start a task that loops and then displays the number of loop iterations: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/cs/run1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/vb/run1.vb#6)] 或者和最常用的方法來啟動工作以[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，是靜態方法。An alternative, and the most common method to start a task in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], is the static method. 屬性會傳回物件。The property returns a object. 多載方法可讓您指定要傳遞給工作建立選項和工作排程器參數。Overloads of the method let you specify parameters to pass to the task creation options and a task scheduler. 下列範例會使用方法啟動工作。The following example uses the method to start a task. 它在功能上相當於前一個範例中的程式碼。It is functionally equivalent to the code in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/cs/startnew1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/vb/startnew1.vb#7)] 如需更完整的範例，請參閱[以工作為基礎的非同步程式設計](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md)。For more complete examples, see [Task-based Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md). ## 將工作建立及執行Separating task creation and execution 類別也會提供建構函式所初始化的工作，但的未排程它執行。The class also provides constructors that initialize the task but that do not schedule it for execution. 基於效能考量，或方法為建立和排定計算的工作的慣用的機制，但是其中必須以建立和排程的情況下，您可以使用建構函式，然後呼叫方法來排定在稍後執行的工作。For performance reasons, the or method is the preferred mechanism for creating and scheduling computational tasks, but for scenarios where creation and scheduling must be separated, you can use the constructors and then call the method to schedule the task for execution at a later time. ## 等候一或多個工作完成Waiting for one or more tasks to complete 工作通常會在執行緒集區執行緒上以非同步方式執行，因為工作具現化時，立即建立並啟動工作的執行緒會繼續執行。Because tasks typically run asynchronously on a thread pool thread, the thread that creates and starts the task continues execution as soon as the task has been instantiated. 在某些情況下，呼叫的執行緒時，在主應用程式執行緒應用程式可能會在結束任何之前，先工作實際上就會開始執行。In some cases, when the calling thread is the main application thread, the app may terminate before any the task actually begins execution. 在其他應用程式的邏輯可能需要呼叫執行緒繼續執行，只有當一或多個工作已完成執行時。In others, your application's logic may require that the calling thread continue execution only when one or more tasks has completed execution. 您可以在呼叫執行緒執行同步和非同步工作它會啟動藉由呼叫`Wait`方法等候一個或多個工作完成。You can synchronize the execution of the calling thread and the asynchronous tasks it launches by calling a `Wait` method to wait for one or more tasks to complete. 若要等候完成單一工作，您可以呼叫其方法。To wait for a single task to complete, you can call its method. 呼叫方法會封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到單一類別執行個體已完成執行。A call to the method blocks the calling thread until the single class instance has completed execution. 下列範例會呼叫無參數無條件地等候，直到工作完成的方法。The following example calls the parameterless method to wait unconditionally until a task completes. 工作模擬的工作，藉由呼叫兩秒睡眠狀態的方法。The task simulates work by calling the method to sleep for two seconds. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/cs/Wait1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/vb/Wait1.vb#8)] 您可以也有條件地等待工作完成。You can also conditionally wait for a task to complete. 和方法會封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到工作完成或經過逾時間隔、 何者較早。The and methods block the calling thread until the task finishes or a timeout interval elapses, whichever comes first. 因為下列範例會啟動兩秒會進入睡眠狀態，但定義了一秒的逾時值，則呼叫執行緒會封鎖直到逾時過期的工作，以及之前工作已完成執行。Since the following example launches a task that sleeps for two seconds but defines a one-second timeout value, the calling thread blocks until the timeout expires and before the task has completed execution. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/cs/Wait2.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/vb/Wait2.vb#9)] 您也可以藉由呼叫提供的取消語彙基元和方法。You can also supply a cancellation token by calling the and methods. 如果此語彙基元的屬性是`true`，等候已取消; 如果它成為 true 時方法會結束。If the token's property is `true`, the wait is cancelled; if it becomes true while the method terminates. 在某些情況下，您可能想要等待完成，但不執行工作的一系列的第一個是注意這項工作。In some cases, you may want to wait for the first of a series of executing tasks to complete, but don't care which task it is. 基於此目的，您可以呼叫其中一個多載的方法。For this purpose, you can call one of the overloads of the method. 下列範例會建立三項工作，其中每個進入睡眠狀態的間隔來判斷隨機號碼產生器。The following example creates three tasks, each of which sleeps for an interval determine by a random number generator. 方法會等候第一個工作完成。The method waits for the first task to complete. 然後這個範例會顯示所有三項工作的狀態相關資訊。The example then displays information about the status of all three tasks. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/cs/WhenAny1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/vb/WaitAny1.vb#10)] 您也可以等待所有的一系列的工作完成藉由呼叫方法。You can also wait for all of a series of tasks to complete by calling the method. 下列範例會建立十個工作、 等候所有的十個完成，然後顯示其狀態。The following example creates ten tasks, waits for all ten to complete, and then displays their status. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/cs/WaitAll1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/vb/WaitAll1.vb#11)] 請注意當您在等候一個或多個工作完成，正在執行的工作中擲回任何例外狀況會傳播呼叫的執行緒上`Wait`方法，如下列範例所示。Note that when you wait for one or more tasks to complete, any exceptions thrown in the running tasks are propagated on the thread that calls the `Wait` method, as the following example shows. 它會啟動 12 的工作，其中三種正常完成和三個例外狀況的擲回。It launches 12 tasks, three of which complete normally and three of which throw an exception. 其餘的六個工作中，三個會取消開始之前，請而且三個被取消時執行它們。Of the remaining six tasks, three are cancelled before the start, and three are cancelled while they executing. 中擲回例外狀況方法呼叫和都是由處理`try` / `catch`區塊。Exceptions are thrown in the method call and are handled by a `try`/`catch` block. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/cs/WaitAll2.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task/vb/WaitAll2.vb#12)] 如需有關在以工作為基礎的非同步作業的例外狀況處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。For more information on exception handling in task-based asynchronous operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md). ## 工作和文化特性Tasks and culture 從桌面應用程式開始目標[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，建立與叫用工作之執行緒的文化特性會成為在執行緒內容的一部分。Starting with desktop apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the thread that creates and invokes a task becomes part of the thread's context. 也就是工作的工作所執行之執行緒的目前文化特性，不論目前的文化特性是工作的呼叫執行緒的文化特性。That is, regardless of the current culture of the thread on which the task executes, the current culture of the task is the culture of the calling thread. 之前的.NET Framework 版本為目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，工作的文化特性為工作所執行之執行緒的文化特性。For apps that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the task is the culture of the thread on which the task executes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 文化特性和以工作為基礎的非同步作業 」 一節主題。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. > [!NOTE] > 市集應用程式遵循 Windows 執行階段中設定和取得的預設文化特性。Store apps follow the Windows Runtime in setting and getting the default culture. ## 適用於偵錯工具開發人員For debugger developers 實作自訂的偵錯工具開發人員的工作數個內部及私人成員可能很有用 （這些可能會變更版本）。For developers implementing custom debuggers, several internal and private members of task may be useful (these may change from release to release). `m_taskId`欄位做為備份存放區屬性，但是存取此欄位直接從偵錯工具可能會比透過屬性的 getter 方法存取相同的值更有效率 (`s_taskIdCounter`計數器用來擷取工作的下一個可用識別碼。）The `m_taskId` field serves as the backing store for the property, however accessing this field directly from a debugger may be more efficient than accessing the same value through the property's getter method (the `s_taskIdCounter` counter is used to retrieve the next available ID for a task). 同樣地，`m_stateFlags`欄位會儲存目前的生命週期階段資訊的工作，也可以透過存取資訊屬性。Similarly, the `m_stateFlags` field stores information about the current lifecycle stage of the task, information also accessible through the property. `m_action`欄位儲存工作的委派的參考和`m_stateObject`欄位儲存由開發人員要傳遞給工作的非同步狀態。The `m_action` field stores a reference to the task's delegate, and the `m_stateObject` field stores the async state passed to the task by the developer. 最後，針對剖析堆疊框架的偵錯工具`InternalWait`方法適用於當工作正在進入等候作業的潛在標記。Finally, for debuggers that parse stack frames, the `InternalWait` method serves a potential marker for when a task is entering a wait operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是呼叫這個建構函式，最常見的方式，來具現化物件和啟動工作是藉由呼叫靜態或方法。Rather than calling this constructor, the most common way to instantiate a object and launch a task is by calling the static or method. 這個建構函式所提供的唯一優點是它可讓物件具現化，分隔從工作引動過程。The only advantage offered by this constructor is that it allows object instantiation to be separated from task invocation. ## Examples 下列範例會使用建構函式來建立工作，以擷取的檔名在指定的目錄。The following example uses the constructor to create tasks that retrieve the filenames in specified directories. 所有工作的檔案名稱都寫入單一物件。All tasks write the file names to a single object. 此範例會接著呼叫方法，以確保所有工作完成，並接著會顯示檔案名稱寫入總數的計數物件。The example then calls the method to ensure that all tasks have completed, and then displays a count of the total number of file names written to the object. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/cs/ctor1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/vb/ctor1.vb#1)] 下列範例是完全相同，不同之處在於它使用方法具現化，並在單一作業中執行的工作。The following example is identical, except that it used the method to instantiate and run the task in a single operation. 方法會傳回代表工作的物件。The method returns the object that represents the task. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/cs/run2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/vb/run2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是呼叫這個建構函式，最常見的方式，來具現化物件和啟動工作是藉由呼叫靜態和方法。Rather than calling this constructor, the most common way to instantiate a object and launch a task is by calling the static and methods. 這個建構函式所提供的唯一優點是它可讓物件具現化，分隔從工作引動過程。The only advantage offered by this constructor is that it allows object instantiation to be separated from task invocation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作平行處理原則 （工作平行程式庫）](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md)和[Managed 執行緒中的取消](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, see [Task Parallelism (Task Parallel Library)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md) and [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md). ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫建構函式建立的工作，會逐一查看 C:\Windows\System32 目錄中的檔案。The following example calls the constructor to create a task that iterates the files in the C:\Windows\System32 directory. Lambda 運算式呼叫方法，將每個檔案的相關資訊物件。The lambda expression calls the method to add information about each file to a object. 每個中斷連結的巢狀的工作所叫用迴圈會檢查的取消語彙基元的狀態，並在要求取消，如果呼叫方法。Each detached nested task invoked by the loop checks the state of the cancellation token and, if cancellation is requested, calls the method. 方法會擲回進行處理的例外狀況`catch`封鎖呼叫執行緒呼叫時方法。The method throws an exception that is handled in a `catch` block when the calling thread calls the method. 方法接著會呼叫啟動工作。The method is then called to start the task. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/cs/run4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/vb/run4.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不進行執行排程目前的工作完成為止，是否因為成功執行到完成為止，判定為失敗，因為發生未處理的例外狀況，或因取消提早結束時完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下列範例定義的工作，填入具有 100 隨機的日期和時間值的陣列。The following example defines a task that populates an array with 100 random date and time values. 它會使用方法來選取最早和最新的日期值，一旦陣列會完全擴展。It uses the method to select the earliest and the latest date values once the array is fully populated. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.continuewith/cs/continuewith1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.continuewith/vb/continuewith1.vb#1)] 主控台應用程式可能會終止之前執行的接續工作，因為呼叫方法，請執行範例結束前完成的接續。Because a console application may terminate before the continuation task executes, the method is called to ensure that the continuation finishes executing before the example ends. 如需其他範例，請參閱[使用接續工作鏈結工作](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/chaining-tasks-by-using-continuation-tasks.md)。For an additional example, see [Chaining Tasks by Using Continuation Tasks](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/chaining-tasks-by-using-continuation-tasks.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不會執行直到目前的工作已完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed. 如果透過指定接續準則`continuationOptions`參數不符合，接續工作將會取消而不是排程。If the continuation criteria specified through the `continuationOptions` parameter are not met, the continuation task will be canceled instead of scheduled. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用指定當前項工作完成時的接續工作應該會以同步方式執行。The following example demonstrates using to specify that a continuation task should run synchronously when the antecedent task completes. (如果指定的工作已完成的時間呼叫時，同步接續會在呼叫執行緒上執行。)(If the specified task has already completed by the time is called, the synchronous continuation will run on the thread calling .) ```csharp public class TaskCounter { private volatile int _count; public void Track(Task t) { if (t == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("t"); Interlocked.Increment(ref _count); t.ContinueWith(ct => Interlocked.Decrement(ref _count), TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously); } public int NumberOfActiveTasks { get { return _count; } } } ``` ```vb Public Class TaskCounter Private _count as Integer Public Sub Track(ByVal t as Task) If t is Nothing Then Throw New ArgumentNullException("t") Interlocked.Increment(_count) t.ContinueWith(Sub(ct) Interlocked.Decrement(_count) End Sub, TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously) End Sub Public ReadOnly Property NumberOfActiveTasks As Integer Get Return _count End Get End Property End Class ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 用來取得目前執行之工作的識別碼執行工作的程式碼的屬性。 is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) property that is used to get the identifier of the currently executing task from the code that the task is executing. 不同於屬性，傳回特定的識別項執行個體。It differs from the property, which returns the identifier of a particular instance. 如果您嘗試擷取從工作正在執行的程式碼之外的值，則屬性會傳回`null`。If you attempt to retrieve the value from outside the code that a task is executing, the property returns `null`. 請注意，雖然發生衝突情況非常罕見，工作識別碼不保證是唯一的。Note that although collisions are very rare, task identifiers are not guaranteed to be unique.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用來指定的時間間隔的延遲時間的所有作業或工作的一部分。The method is typically used to delay the operation of all or part of a task for a specified time interval. 大多數情況下，會導入的時間延遲：Most commonly, the time delay is introduced: - 在開始工作，如下列範例顯示。At the beginning of the task, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.delay/cs/delay5.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.delay/vb/delay5.vb#5)] - 一段時間時執行工作。Sometime while the task is executing. 在此情況下，呼叫方法執行為工作中, 的子工作，如下列範例所示。In this case, the call to the method executes as a child task within a task, as the following example shows. 請注意，因為工作呼叫方法以非同步方式執行，父工作必須等候它完成使用`await`關鍵字。Note that since the task that calls the method executes asynchronously, the parent task must wait for it to complete by using the `await` keyword. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.delay/cs/delay5.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.delay/vb/delay5.vb#7)] 指定的時間延遲之後，在完成工作狀態。After the specified time delay, the task is completed in the state. 這個方法會取決於系統時鐘。This method depends on the system clock. 這表示的時間延遲將大約等於系統時鐘的解析度如果`millisecondsDelay`引數小於大約 15 毫秒在 Windows 系統系統時鐘的解析度。This means that the time delay will approximately equal the resolution of the system clock if the `millisecondsDelay` argument is less than the resolution of the system clock, which is approximately 15 milliseconds on Windows systems. ## Examples 下列範例會示範簡單搭配方法。The following example shows a simple use of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.delay/cs/delay1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.delay/vb/delay1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存產生的例外狀況擲回未處理的例外狀況的工作，以及傳播包裝在中呼叫或存取屬性。Tasks that throw unhandled exceptions store the resulting exception and propagate it wrapped in a in calls to or in accesses to the property. 工作執行個體是記憶體回收的時間未觀察到任何例外狀況會在完成項執行緒上傳播。Any exceptions not observed by the time the task instance is garbage collected will be propagated on the finalizer thread. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[例外狀況處理 （工作平行程式庫）](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。For more information and an example, see [Exception Handling (Task Parallel Library)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).

[!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/cs/Run11.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/vb/Run11.vb#11)] 下列範例是類似於上一個，，不同之處在於它使用 lambda 運算式來定義的工作是將執行的程式碼。The following example is similar to the previous one, except that it uses a lambda expression to define the code that the task is to execute. Lambda 運算式呼叫方法，將每個檔案的相關資訊物件。The lambda expression calls the method to add information about each file to a object. 每個中斷連結的巢狀的工作所叫用迴圈會檢查的取消語彙基元的狀態，並在要求取消，如果呼叫方法。Each detached nested task invoked by the loop checks the state of the cancellation token and, if cancellation is requested, calls the method. 方法會擲回進行處理的例外狀況`catch`封鎖呼叫執行緒呼叫時方法。The method throws an exception that is handled in a `catch` block when the calling thread calls the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是簡單的替代方案方法。The method is a simpler alternative to the method. 它會建立工作以下列的預設值：It creates a task with the following default values: - 它的取消語彙基元是。Its cancellation token is . - 其屬性值是。Its property value is . - 它會使用預設工作排程器。It uses the default task scheduler. 處理工作的作業所擲回的例外狀況的資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。For information on handling exceptions thrown by task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md). ## Examples 下列範例會計算文字在文字檔案，代表已發行活頁簿中的近似數目。The following example counts the approximate number of words in text files that represent published books. 每項工作負責開啟檔案，以非同步的方式，讀取其完整內容，而且使用規則運算式的計算字數統計。Each task is responsible for opening a file, reading its entire contents asynchronously, and calculating the word count by using a regular expression. 呼叫方法，請確定所有工作已都完成之後，主控台中顯示每本書的字數。The method is called to ensure that all tasks have completed before displaying the word count of each book to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/cs/run3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/vb/run3.vb#2)] 規則運算式`\p{P}*\s+`比對零個、 一個或多個標點符號字元後面接著一個或多個空格字元。The regular expression `\p{P}*\s+` matches zero, one, or more punctuation characters followed by one or more whitespace characters. 它會假設的相符項目總數等於大約字數。It assumes that the total number of matches equals the approximate word count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作開始執行之前，已要求取消，則不會執行工作。If cancellation is requested before the task begins execution, the task does not execute. 而是設定為狀態，則擲回例外狀況。Instead it is set to the state and throws a exception. 方法是簡單的替代方案方法。The method is a simpler alternative to the method. 它會建立工作以下列的預設值：It creates a task with the following default values: - 其屬性值是。Its property value is . - 它會使用預設工作排程器。It uses the default task scheduler. 處理工作的作業所擲回的例外狀況的資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。For information on handling exceptions thrown by task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立將迴圈，直到計數器就會遞增為 2 百萬個值的 20 任務。The following example creates 20 tasks that will loop until a counter is incremented to a value of 2 million. 當前 10 個工作都達到 2 百萬個時，取消語彙基元被取消，並會取消其計數器未達到 2 百萬個的任何工作。When the first 10 tasks reach 2 million, the cancellation token is cancelled, and any tasks whose counters have not reached 2 million are cancelled. 此範例示範可能的輸出。The example shows possible output. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/cs/Run7.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/vb/Run7.vb#7)] 而不是使用屬性可檢查例外狀況，此範例會逐一查看所有工作，以決定其已成功完成，這都已取消。Instead of using the property to examine exceptions, the example iterates all tasks to determine which have completed successfully and which have been cancelled. 對於已完成，它會顯示工作所傳回的值。For those that have completed, it displays the value returned by the task. 取消是合作式的因為每個工作可以決定如何回應取消。Because cancellation is cooperative, each task can decide how to respond to cancellation. 下列範例是類似第一，只不過在語彙基元被取消，工作會恢復它們已經完成而不是擲回例外狀況的反覆項目數。The following example is like the first, except that, once the token is cancelled, tasks return the number of iterations they've completed rather than throw an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/cs/Run28.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/vb/Run28.vb#28)] 此範例仍然必須處理例外狀況，因為尚未啟動時，在要求取消的任何工作仍會擲回的例外狀況。The example still must handle the exception, since any tasks that have not started when cancellation is requested still throw an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，工作會在執行緒集區執行緒上非同步執行，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Ordinarily, tasks are executed asynchronously on a thread pool thread and do not block the calling thread. 藉由呼叫執行的工作方法會關聯到目前且在呼叫執行緒上執行。Tasks executed by calling the method are associated with the current and are run on the calling thread. 如果目標排程器不支援呼叫的執行緒上執行這項工作，以便在排程器上執行排定工作時，會和呼叫的執行緒會封鎖直到工作完成執行。If the target scheduler does not support running this task on the calling thread, the task will be scheduled for execution on the scheduler, and the calling thread will block until the task has completed execution. 即使工作是以同步方式執行，仍應該呼叫呼叫執行緒處理工作可能會擲回任何例外狀況。Even though the task runs synchronously, the calling thread should still call to handle any exceptions that the task might throw. 如需例外狀況處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。For more information on exception handling, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md). 藉由呼叫執行的工作藉由呼叫的方法會具現化或類別建構函式。Tasks executed by calling the method are instantiated by calling a or class constructor. 若要以同步方式執行工作必須在狀態。The task to be run synchronously must be in the state. 工作可能會啟動，以及僅執行一次。A task may be started and run only once. 排程工作中例外狀況的第二個階段結果的任何嘗試。Any attempts to schedule a task a second time results in an exception. ## Examples 下列範例會比較工作，藉由呼叫執行具有一個以非同步方式執行方法。The following example compares a task executed by calling the method with one executed asynchronously. 在這兩種情況下，工作執行的顯示工作識別碼和執行緒的識別碼相同的 lambda 運算式上執行工作。In both cases, the tasks execute identical lambda expressions that display the task ID and the ID of the thread on which the task is running. 工作計算介於 1 到 1000000 之間的整數的總和。The task calculates the sum of the integers between 1 and 1,000,000. 範例輸出所示，執行此工作，藉由呼叫應用程式執行緒，而非同步工作沒有執行的方法。As the output from the example shows, the task executed by calling the method runs on the application thread, while the asynchronous task does not. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.runsynchronously/cs/runsynchronously1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.runsynchronously/vb/runsynchronously1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由呼叫執行的工作藉由呼叫的方法會具現化或類別建構函式。Tasks executed by calling the method are instantiated by calling a or class constructor. 若要以同步方式執行工作必須在狀態。The task to be run synchronously must be in the state. 工作可能會啟動，以及僅執行一次。A task may be started and run only once. 排程工作中例外狀況的第二個階段結果的任何嘗試。Any attempts to schedule a task a second time results in an exception. 如果目標排程器不支援目前的執行緒上執行這項工作，以便在排程器上執行排定工作時，會和目前的執行緒會封鎖直到工作完成執行。If the target scheduler does not support running this task on the current thread, the task will be scheduled for execution on the scheduler, and the current thread will block until the task has completed execution. 因為這個緣故，呼叫的執行緒不會不需要呼叫方法，例如以確保工作已完成執行。Because of this, the calling thread does not need to call a method such as to ensure that the task has completed execution. 如需有關工作作業的例外狀況處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。For more information on exception handling for task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作可能會啟動，以及僅執行一次。A task may be started and run only once. 第二次排定工作的任何嘗試會導致例外狀況。Any attempts to schedule a task a second time will result in an exception. 用來執行的工作，透過呼叫其中一個已建立建構函式。The is used to execute a task that has been created by calling one of the constructors. 一般而言，您這樣做時，您需要將從其執行，例如當您有條件地執行工作所建立的工作的建立。Typically, you do this when you need to separate the task's creation from its execution, such as when you conditionally execute tasks that you've created. 較常見的情況，您不需要個別執行的工作具現化，我們建議您呼叫的多載或方法。For the more common case in which you don't need to separate task instantiation from execution, we recommend that you call an overload of the or method. 處理工作的作業所擲回的例外狀況的資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。For information on handling exceptions thrown by task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md). ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫建構函式來具現化新物件，以顯示其識別碼與 managed 的執行緒識別碼的工作，並接著會執行迴圈。The following example calls the constructor to instantiate a new object that displays its task ID and managed thread ID and then executes a loop. 然後它會呼叫方法才能執行工作。It then calls the method to execute the task. 由於這是主控台應用程式呼叫方法是為了防止應用程式終止之前執行的工作完成。Since this is a console app, the call to the method is necessary to prevent the app from terminating before the task finishes execution. remarks.format: ## Remarks 擷取的值屬性不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到工作完成為止。Retrieving the value of the property does not block the calling thread until the task has completed. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[使用接續工作鏈結工作](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/chaining-tasks-by-using-continuation-tasks.md)和[如何： 取消工作及其子系](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-cancel-a-task-and-its-children.md)。For more information and an example, see [Chaining Tasks by Using Continuation Tasks](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/chaining-tasks-by-using-continuation-tasks.md) and [How to: Cancel a Task and Its Children](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-cancel-a-task-and-its-children.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立將迴圈，直到計數器就會遞增為 2 百萬個值的 20 任務。The following example creates 20 tasks that will loop until a counter is incremented to a value of 2 million. 當前 10 個工作都達到 2 百萬個時，取消語彙基元被取消，並會取消其計數器未達到 2 百萬個的任何工作。When the first 10 tasks reach 2 million, the cancellation token is cancelled, and any tasks whose counters have not reached 2 million are cancelled. 此範例接著會檢查屬性指出是否已順利完成，或已取消每項工作。The example then examines the property of each task to indicate whether it completed successfully or was cancelled. 對於已完成，它會顯示工作所傳回的值。For those that completed, it displays the value returned by the task. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/cs/Run7.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.run/vb/Run7.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會造成呼叫執行緒等候，直到目前的工作已完成同步處理方法。 is a synchronization method that causes the calling thread to wait until the current task has completed. 如果目前的工作開始執行，等候方法嘗試移除從排程器工作並執行它內嵌在目前的執行緒上。If the current task has not started execution, the Wait method attempts to remove the task from the scheduler and execute it inline on the current thread. 如果無法這麼做，或目前的工作已經開始執行，它會封鎖呼叫執行緒直到工作完成。If it is unable to do that, or if the current task has already started execution, it blocks the calling thread until the task completes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Task.Wait 和 「 內嵌 」](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/10/15/9907713.aspx)中平行程式設計.NET 部落格。For more information, see [Task.Wait and "Inlining"](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/10/15/9907713.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[如何： 等候一個或多個工作完成](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79cb522b-9c93-46ed-b23a-c06908f3a374)。For more information and an example, see [How to: Wait on One or More Tasks to Complete](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79cb522b-9c93-46ed-b23a-c06908f3a374). ## Examples 下列範例會啟動的工作，會產生介於 0 到 100 之間的 1 百萬個亂數，並會計算其平均值。The following example starts a task that generates one million random integers between 0 and 100 and computes their mean. 此範例會使用方法，以確保應用程式終止前，工作會完成。The example uses the method to ensure that the task completes before the application terminates. 否則，因為這是主控台應用程式時，此範例會之前就終止工作可以計算並顯示平均值。Otherwise, because this is a console application, the example would terminate before the task can compute and display the mean. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是同步處理方法會造成呼叫執行緒等待目前的工作執行個體，以完成之前發生下列其中一項： is a synchronization method that causes the calling thread to wait for the current task instance to complete until one of the following occurs: - 工作順利完成。The task completes successfully. - 工作本身卻遭取消或擲回例外狀況。The task itself is canceled or throws an exception. 在此情況下，您處理例外狀況。In this case, you handle an exception. 屬性包含有關例外狀況或例外狀況詳細資料。The property contains details about the exception or exceptions. - 所定義的間隔`millisecondsTimeout`捨棄。The interval defined by `millisecondsTimeout` elapses. 在此情況下，目前的執行緒會繼續執行，而且方法會傳回`false`。In this case, the current thread resumes execution and the method returns `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會啟動的工作，會產生介於 0 到 100 之間的 5 百萬個亂數，並會計算其平均值。The following example starts a task that generates five million random integers between 0 and 100 and computes their mean. 此範例會使用方法等候 150 毫秒內完成的應用程式。The example uses the method to wait for the application to complete within 150 milliseconds. 如果應用程式正常完成，工作將會顯示總和與平均值它已產生隨機數字。If the application completes normally, the task displays the sum and mean of the random numbers that it has generated. 如果經過逾時間隔，這個範例會顯示一則訊息之前它所終止。If the timeout interval has elapsed, the example displays a message before it terminates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立可取消等待; 也就是說，它會導致目前的執行緒等候，直到發生下列其中一項：The method creates a cancelable wait; that is, it causes the current thread to wait until one of the following occurs: - 在工作完成。The task completes. - 已取消的取消語彙基元。The cancellation token is canceled. 在此情況下，呼叫方法會擲回。In this case, the call to the method throws an . > [!NOTE] > 取消`cancellationToken`取消語彙基元已不會影響執行中工作，除非它也已傳遞的取消語彙基元，並準備好處理取消作業。Canceling the `cancellationToken` cancellation token has no effect on the running task unless it has also been passed the cancellation token and is prepared to handle cancellation. 傳遞`cancellationToken`物件給這個方法只會允許要取消等待。Passing the `cancellationToken` object to this method simply allows the wait to be canceled. ## Examples 下列範例說明將簡單的取消語彙基元來取消等待工作完成。The following example illustrates the simple use of a cancellation token to cancel waiting for a task's completion. 工作啟動時，會呼叫方法來取消的語彙基元來源取消語彙基元，然後再延遲任何五秒。A task is launched, calls the method to cancel any of the token source's cancellation tokens, and then delays for five seconds. 請注意工作本身尚未被傳送的取消語彙基元，而且不是可取消。Note that the task itself has not been passed the cancellation token and is not cancelable. 應用程式執行緒會呼叫工作方法等候工作完成，但等候已取消一旦取消語彙基元取消而就會擲回。The application thread calls the task's method to wait for the task to complete, but the wait is canceled once the cancellation token is cancelled and an is thrown. 例外狀況處理常式報告的例外狀況，然後進入睡眠狀態六秒。The exception handler reports the exception and then sleeps for six seconds. 範例輸出所示，這種延遲可讓工作在完成狀態。As the output from the example shows, that delay allows the task to complete in the state. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.wait/cs/wait3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.wait/vb/wait3.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是同步處理方法會造成呼叫執行緒等待目前的工作執行個體，以完成之前發生下列其中一項： is a synchronization method that causes the calling thread to wait for the current task instance to complete until one of the following occurs: - 工作順利完成。The task completes successfully. - 工作本身卻遭取消或擲回例外狀況。The task itself is canceled or throws an exception. 在此情況下，您處理例外狀況。In this case, you handle an exception. 屬性包含有關例外狀況或例外狀況詳細資料。The property contains details about the exception or exceptions. - `cancellationToken`取消語彙基元。The `cancellationToken` cancellation token is canceled. 在此情況下，呼叫方法會擲回。In this case, the call to the method throws an . - 所定義的間隔`millisecondsTimeout`捨棄。The interval defined by `millisecondsTimeout` elapses. 在此情況下，目前的執行緒會繼續執行，而且方法會傳回`false`。In this case, the current thread resumes execution and the method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 取消`cancellationToken`取消語彙基元已不會影響執行中工作，除非它也已傳遞的取消語彙基元，並準備好處理取消作業。Canceling the `cancellationToken` cancellation token has no effect on the running task unless it has also been passed the cancellation token and is prepared to handle cancellation. 傳遞`cancellationToken`物件給這個方法只會允許要取消等待根據在某些狀況。Passing the `cancellationToken` object to this method simply allows the wait to be canceled based on some condition. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法以提供的逾時值和取消語彙基元可以結束等候工作完成。The following example calls the method to provide both a timeout value and a cancellation token that can end the wait for a task's completion. 新的執行緒已啟動並執行`CancelToken`方法，這個方法會暫停，然後呼叫方法來取消取消語彙基元。A new thread is started and executes the `CancelToken` method, which pauses and then calls the method to cancel the cancellation tokens. 工作，然後啟動，以及 5 秒鐘的延遲。A task is then launched and delays for 5 seconds. 方法以等候工作完成再呼叫，並提供簡短的逾時值和取消語彙基元。The method is then called to wait for the task's completion and is provided both a brief timeout value and a cancellation token. remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載這個方法傳回您感興趣的一組工作的狀態或一組工作所擲回的例外狀況時，通常會呼叫物件。The overloads of the method that return a object are typically called when you are interested in the status of a set of tasks or in the exceptions thrown by a set of tasks. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。The call to method does not block the calling thread. 如果任何一個提供的工作完成處於錯誤狀態時，傳回的工作也會完成中其中其例外狀況將會包含未包裝的例外狀況，從每個提供的工作集的彙總的狀態。If any of the supplied tasks completes in a faulted state, the returned task will also complete in a state, where its exceptions will contain the aggregation of the set of unwrapped exceptions from each of the supplied tasks. 如果沒有提供的工作發生錯誤，但至少一個已取消，則傳回的工作將在結束狀態。If none of the supplied tasks faulted but at least one of them was canceled, the returned task will end in the state. 如果工作都未發生錯誤的工作已取消，則產生的工作將在結束狀態。If none of the tasks faulted and none of the tasks were canceled, the resulting task will end in the state. 如果提供陣列/可列舉不包含任何工作，則傳回的工作就會立即轉換成狀態，才能傳回給呼叫者。If the supplied array/enumerable contains no tasks, the returned task will immediately transition to a state before it's returned to the caller. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一組 ping 陣列中的 Url 的工作。The following example creates a set of tasks that ping the URLs in an array. 工作會儲存在`List`集合傳遞至方法。The tasks are stored in a `List` collection that is passed to the method. 若要在呼叫之後方法可確保所有執行緒都完成，此範例會檢查屬性來判斷是否有錯誤的任何工作。After the call to the method ensures that all threads have completed, the example examines the property to determine whether any tasks have faulted. remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載這個方法傳回您感興趣的一組工作的狀態或一組工作所擲回的例外狀況時，通常會呼叫物件。The overloads of the method that return a object are typically called when you are interested in the status of a set of tasks or in the exceptions thrown by a set of tasks. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。The call to method does not block the calling thread. 如果任何一個提供的工作完成處於錯誤狀態時，傳回的工作也會完成中其中其例外狀況將會包含未包裝的例外狀況，從每個提供的工作集的彙總的狀態。If any of the supplied tasks completes in a faulted state, the returned task will also complete in a state, where its exceptions will contain the aggregation of the set of unwrapped exceptions from each of the supplied tasks. 如果沒有提供的工作發生錯誤，但至少一個已取消，則傳回的工作將在結束狀態。If none of the supplied tasks faulted but at least one of them was canceled, the returned task will end in the state. 如果工作都未發生錯誤的工作已取消，則產生的工作將在結束狀態。If none of the tasks faulted and none of the tasks were canceled, the resulting task will end in the state. 如果提供陣列/可列舉不包含任何工作，則傳回的工作就會立即轉換成狀態，才能傳回給呼叫者。If the supplied array/enumerable contains no tasks, the returned task will immediately transition to a state before it's returned to the caller. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一組 ping 陣列中的 Url 的工作。The following example creates a set of tasks that ping the URLs in an array. 工作會儲存在`List`集合轉換成陣列，並傳遞至方法。The tasks are stored in a `List` collection that is converted to an array and passed to the method. 若要在呼叫之後方法可確保所有執行緒都完成，此範例會檢查屬性來判斷是否有錯誤的任何工作。After the call to the method ensures that all threads have completed, the example examines the property to determine whether any tasks have faulted. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。The call to method does not block the calling thread. 不過，所傳回的呼叫屬性未封鎖呼叫執行緒。However, a call to the returned property does block the calling thread. 如果任何一個提供的工作完成處於錯誤狀態時，傳回的工作也會完成中其中其例外狀況將會包含未包裝的例外狀況，從每個提供的工作集的彙總的狀態。If any of the supplied tasks completes in a faulted state, the returned task will also complete in a state, where its exceptions will contain the aggregation of the set of unwrapped exceptions from each of the supplied tasks. 如果沒有提供的工作發生錯誤，但至少一個已取消，則傳回的工作將在結束狀態。If none of the supplied tasks faulted but at least one of them was canceled, the returned task will end in the state. 如果工作都未發生錯誤的工作已取消，則產生的工作將在結束狀態。If none of the tasks faulted and none of the tasks were canceled, the resulting task will end in the state. 傳回工作的屬性會設定為按照提供包含所有的相同順序提供的工作結果的陣列 (例如如果輸入工作所包含的陣列 t1、 t2、 t3、 輸出工作屬性會傳回`TResult[]`其中`arr[0] == t1.Result, arr[1] == t2.Result, and arr[2] == t3.Result)`。The property of the returned task will be set to an array containing all of the results of the supplied tasks in the same order as they were provided (e.g. if the input tasks array contained t1, t2, t3, the output task's property will return an `TResult[]` where `arr[0] == t1.Result, arr[1] == t2.Result, and arr[2] == t3.Result)`. 如果`tasks`引數包含任何工作，則傳回的工作就會立即轉換成狀態，才能傳回給呼叫者。If the `tasks` argument contains no tasks, the returned task will immediately transition to a state before it's returned to the caller. 傳回`TResult[]`就會是陣列的項目為 0。The returned `TResult[]` will be an array of 0 elements. ## Examples 下列範例會建立十個工作，其中每個具現化隨機號碼產生器建立 1000 介於 1 到 1000 之間的隨機數字，並會計算其平均值。The following example creates ten tasks, each of which instantiates a random number generator that creates 1,000 random numbers between 1 and 1,000 and computes their mean. 方法用來延遲亂數產生器的具現化，使它們不會建立具有相同的種子值。The method is used to delay instantiation of the random number generators so that they are not created with identical seed values. 若要呼叫方法接著會傳回陣列，其中包含平均值計算出每項工作。The call to the method then returns an array that contains the mean computed by each task. 然後使用這些計算整體的平均數。These are then used to calculate the overall mean. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。The call to method does not block the calling thread. 不過，所傳回的呼叫屬性未封鎖呼叫執行緒。However, a call to the returned property does block the calling thread. 如果任何一個提供的工作完成處於錯誤狀態時，傳回的工作也會完成中其中其例外狀況將會包含未包裝的例外狀況，從每個提供的工作集的彙總的狀態。If any of the supplied tasks completes in a faulted state, the returned task will also complete in a state, where its exceptions will contain the aggregation of the set of unwrapped exceptions from each of the supplied tasks. 如果沒有提供的工作發生錯誤，但至少一個已取消，則傳回的工作將在結束狀態。If none of the supplied tasks faulted but at least one of them was canceled, the returned task will end in the state. 如果工作都未發生錯誤的工作已取消，則產生的工作將在結束狀態。If none of the tasks faulted and none of the tasks were canceled, the resulting task will end in the state. 傳回的工作將會設定為按照提供包含所有的相同順序提供的工作結果的陣列 (例如如果輸入工作所包含的陣列 t1、 t2、 t3、 輸出工作會傳回`TResult[]`其中`arr[0] == t1.Result, arr[1] == t2.Result, and arr[2] == t3.Result)`。The of the returned task will be set to an array containing all of the results of the supplied tasks in the same order as they were provided (e.g. if the input tasks array contained t1, t2, t3, the output task's will return an `TResult[]` where `arr[0] == t1.Result, arr[1] == t2.Result, and arr[2] == t3.Result)`. 如果提供陣列/可列舉不包含任何工作，則傳回的工作就會立即轉換成狀態，才能傳回給呼叫者。If the supplied array/enumerable contains no tasks, the returned task will immediately transition to a state before it's returned to the caller. 傳回`TResult[]`就會是陣列的項目為 0。The returned `TResult[]` will be an array of 0 elements. ## Examples 下列範例會建立十個工作，其中每個具現化隨機號碼產生器建立 1000 介於 1 到 1000 之間的隨機數字，並會計算其平均值。The following example creates ten tasks, each of which instantiates a random number generator that creates 1,000 random numbers between 1 and 1,000 and computes their mean. 在此情況下，將 10 個個別的工作儲存在`Task`陣列。In this case, the ten individual tasks are stored in a `Task` array. 方法用來延遲亂數產生器的具現化，使它們不會建立具有相同的種子值。The method is used to delay instantiation of the random number generators so that they are not created with identical seed values. 若要呼叫方法接著會傳回陣列，其中包含平均值計算出每項工作。The call to the method then returns an array that contains the mean computed by each task. 然後使用這些計算整體的平均數。These are then used to calculate the overall mean. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的工作會完成當任何一個提供的工作已完成。The returned task will complete when any of the supplied tasks has completed. 傳回的工作將一律會在結束`RanToCompletion`它的結果集的第一個工作完成狀態。The returned task will always end in the `RanToCompletion` state with its Result set to the first task to complete. 這是 true，即使在第一個工作完成結束`Canceled`或`Faulted`狀態。This is true even if the first task to complete ended in the `Canceled` or `Faulted` state.

summary.span: 建立會在等候時以非同步方式遞交 (Yield) 給目前內容的 awaitable 工具。

span.span: Creates an awaitable task that asynchronously yields back to the current context when awaited.

returns.span: 內容，這個內容會在受到等候時非同步轉換回等候當時的最新內容。

span.span: A context that, when awaited, will asynchronously transition back into the current context at the time of the await.

returns.span: 如果目前的 非 null，即視為目前的內容。

span.span: If the current is non-null, it is treated as the current context.

returns.span: 否則，將與目前執行之工作相關聯的工作排程器視為目前的內容。

span.span: Otherwise, the task scheduler that is associated with the currently executing task is treated as the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`await Task.Yield();`強制以非同步方式完成方法的非同步方法中。You can use `await Task.Yield();` in an asynchronous method to force the method to complete asynchronously. 如果沒有目前的同步處理內容 (物件)，這將會公佈回該內容的方法執行的其餘部分。If there is a current synchronization context ( object), this will post the remainder of the method’s execution back to that context. 不過，內容會決定如何設定這個工作，相對於其他可能是暫止的工作優先權。However, the context will decide how to prioritize this work relative to other work that may be pending. 存在於 UI 執行緒在大多數的 UI 環境中的同步處理內容通常會設定優先順序工作公佈到高於輸入和轉譯工作內容。The synchronization context that is present on a UI thread in most UI environments will often prioritize work posted to the context higher than input and rendering work. 基於這個理由，請勿依賴`await Task.Yield();`以保留 UI 回應性。For this reason, do not rely on `await Task.Yield();` to keep a UI responsive. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[有用的抽象概念啟用 ContinueWith](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2008/07/23/8768673.aspx)中平行程式設計.NET 部落格。For more information, see the entry [Useful Abstractions Enabled with ContinueWith](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2008/07/23/8768673.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
